thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com
thread.title: John

author: John
title: John
text:
I love shopping at Ssense because everything has been seamless.
To start with, they curate their selection well so I'm not scrolling through junk.
Second, the UX is good, and it's easy to check out.
Third, shipping is FAST (even to the US from Canada).
Fourth, I have returned something before and that was also seamless. Personally I prefer dealing with a website where I can do everything myself, quickly, at the time I want. I hate having to call/email and wait for a response. I never have to do that with Ssense -- I'm able to shop, check out, and do returns 24/7.
